flagshipEvents.name: AvionX
flagshipEvents.description: An exciting aerospace challenge that blends analytical thinking with engineering creativity. The event begins with an interactive problem-solving round testing logic, adaptability, and teamwork. It then moves into a technical stage where ideas are converted into structured designs under realistic aerospace constraints. Precision, innovation, and collaboration define the experience.

flagshipEvents.name: Brand-IT
flagshipEvents.description: Welcome to Brand It, where innovation meets strategy! Teams will craft a brand from scratch, creating logos, color palettes, product visuals, and packaging designs. Stand out by presenting impactful promotional materials in this exciting multi-day battle of creativity and competition. Get ready to build, brand, and shine like a pro!

flagshipEvents.name: Civicture
flagshipEvents.description: Civicture is an immersive platform for future-tech engineering and innovation. It begins with a concept challenge where participants present bold ideas using emerging technologies. The event then moves into a detailed engineering and system design phase, transforming ideas into precise technical models and futuristic solutions. Be part of building tomorrow’s technology-driven world!

flagshipEvents.name: CodeStorm
flagshipEvents.description: CODESTORM is a flagship coding competition focused on logical thinking and code optimization through structured rounds of increasing difficulty. Participants solve challenging problems that build efficient programming skills essential for engineering tomorrow’s technology.

flagshipEvents.name: Hack-A-Maze
flagshipEvents.description: Dive into Hack-A-Maze, an adrenaline-packed challenge that tasks you with building a self-driven obstacle bot to conquer mazes on its own and the quickest escape claims victory!

flagshipEvents.name: Mechronins
flagshipEvents.description: This lively three-round event blends mechanical quizzes, creative thinking, and presentations into an experience that keeps you involved from start to finish. Sharpen your ideas, step into the challenge, and let your engineering instincts take the lead.

flagshipEvents.name: Mock Placements
flagshipEvents.description: Mock placement closely resemble actual corporate recruitment processes. By simulating real interviews, they help candidates understand expectations and improve their performance through expert feedback. Participants also have the flexibility to choose their preferred domain, allowing them to tailor the experience to their career aspirations and strengths. An opportunity exclusively available to the students of UVCE!

flagshipEvents.name: Silic-O-Hack
flagshipEvents.description: Silic-O-Hack is a flagship simulated hardware hackathon that challenges participants to solve real-world problems using creativity, logic, and electronics skills. Shortlisted teams design, simulate, and present innovative circuit-based solutions using TinkerCAD, highlighting technical excellence and practical innovation.

flagshipEvents.name: Summit
flagshipEvents.description: Summit is a flagship event for students that provides a formal platform for thoughtful discussions. Participants collaborate to design impactful and practical solutions, sharpening their problem-solving and leadership skills. The event inspires socially responsible thinking and empowers students to become effective agents of change.

flagshipEvents.name: Laser Tag
flagshipEvents.description: Step into the battlefield with Laser Tag, a high-energy combat arena where strategy, speed, and teamwork decide the winner. Gear up, lock targets, and outsmart your opponents in an tactical face-off—only the sharpest shooters and smartest tacticians will dominate the arena.
